subject: Pro x or Plus X Ultra
description_text:
Hello, I'm intrigued by your pedals set, but i'm a bit confused on witch
one is the latest version of best professional pedals;
 in this " Simsonn Pedal Pro X Ultra with Haptics" the one that is the
better or this version " Pro X Ultra Sim Racing Pedal with Haptic Reactor
Optional" ?
Thanks in advance for the support

conversations.body_text: Hi Cristian,    They are identical, with the sole distinction being haptics: one is the version with haptics, while the other allows you to choose whether to include haptics or not.
